item.title: Can't believe this forum post i found
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I saw this in a signature and laughed:

America is a CHRISTIAN nation, it used to be a CHRISTIAN nation and it will ALWAYS be a CHRISTIAN nation. Praise JESUS and rise up against the MUSLIM invaders
Needless to say, it's obviously a troll and has [quote="reyx7, post:17, topic:402495"]3 types of people in it: trolls, serious Christians, and retards who didn't know how to troll[/quote] Most of the forum is made of trolls and is quite obvious by some of the posts you find there. There was another post about having demons in your anus, I'll try to find it later. EDIT: Also apparently Muslims worship the moon. While reading up some information about this church, I discovered that the former owner had a degree in English and consequently was probably a good troll, which is what this website seems to be about. It looks like they created a website "for teh lulz" and got themselves some real christians who think they're both thinking the same way but who don't know that the first party is actually just trolling.

Also this website literally reminded me of this: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Empress_of_Mijak

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @shamcooly shamcooly
item.description:
@shamcooly wrote:

they’re fuckin trolls lol

en.wikipedia.org

Landover Baptist Church

The Landover Baptist Church is the website of a parody fundamentalist Baptist church. The church lampoons fundamentalist, Independent Baptist churches and Biblical literalism, and originated as a satire of Liberty University. The site was created by Chris Harper, who obtained his master's degree in English Literature from George Mason University in 1993 after being expelled from Liberty University (founded by Jerry Falwell) in 1989 for producing a radio show satirising the school's procedures w...

item.source: Can't believe this forum post i found

item.title: Can't believe this forum post i found
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

That topic had 3 types of people in it: trolls, serious Christians, and retards who didn’t know how to troll

Video games are really going downhill. When I was a kid, video games did what they do best: trying to imitate big-budget, small-brain hollywood movies.

Now there’s all this “indie”, “community content”, and “sandbox”…

“User generated content” is just a politically-correct way of “giving the tools of production to the masses” - the definition of SOCIALISM!

And “sandbox” or “nonlinear” are just polite ways of saying “no Gods, no masters”, an anarchist slogan. They’re setting up a generation to become socialist anarchists!

Game developers create worlds, comparable to how God created The World. Kids who grow up in virtual worlds will learn based on virtual reality, not God’s reality.

God created a world were people need to be told what to do, and be given just enough power to do what they are told and no more. God created a world with boundaries, where you must follow a straight and narrow path. Video games should reflect this.


I think this guy was highly serious.

Overall, I feel either:

  1. These are the GREATEST trolls on the planet
  2. These are most FUCKING RETARDED CHRISTIANS on the planet

I’m now at page 16, and I’m REALLY starting to lead toward 2. These people are fucking rediculous. To the nether with all of them.

Read full topic
